summary: Adds a new sword witch has an enchantment that's similar to the "soul tear" shout from Dawnguard.
descriptionHtml:
[u]The new enchantment has three effects:[/u]

1. +15 Damage
2. Soul Trap
3. If you hit a DEAD person/creature it will come back from the dead and fight for you 120 s.


[u][center]How to get the new enchantment:[/center][/u]

[center]1. Find the sword
2. Disenchant
3. ???????
4. Profit[/center]


The new sword named "Black Katana" is located in Rorikstead. You can search it. Or the easy method:
type in console          help black       or        help katana            and  scroll up until you find the correct ID 


Dawnguard DLC required


If you experience any issues or have ideas please leave a comment. Have Fun!
author: skoomaface
